ReleaseNote:
**HLAE 2.110.0 (2021-03-05T12:02Z)**
* Included AfxHookSource 1.93.0 (2021-03-05T12:02Z).

**AfxHookSource 1.93.0 (2021-03-05T12:02Z)**
* Fixed mirv_streams baseFx streams not getting truly removed and lingering around, causing oddities, fixes #601.
* Added option 2 to mirv_fix selectedPlayerGlow 0|1|2 (2 means always glow selected player), required for #603.
* Improved glow color render passs detection, required for #603.
* Added option normailze 0|1 to glowColorMap action, required for #603. This option is disabled (0) by default for backwards compatibility, but we strongly recommend to enable it (1).

The HLAE Wiki article https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/CS:GO-Changing-X-Ray-color will be updated with an example how to glow/xray only on the spectated player using 3rd person camera (#603).
